targets.rawSql: SELECT SUM(net_units_sold), REPLACE(country, 'Russian Federation', 'Russia') as country FROM steam_sold GROUP BY country

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(datelocal,$__interval),
  sum(adds) - sum(deletes) - SUM(purchases_and_activations) - SUM(gifts)
FROM steam_wishlists
WHERE
  game = '$games'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(datelocal,$__interval),
  sum(adds) - sum(deletes) - SUM(purchases_and_activations) - SUM(gifts)
FROM steam_wishlists
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(datelocal) AND
  game = '$games'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(date, $__interval),
  sum(net_units_sold)
FROM steam_sold
WHERE
   game = '$games'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(date, $__interval),
  sum(net_units_sold)
FROM steam_sold
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date) AND 
   game = '$games'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  date AS "time",
  (SELECT 100.0 * SUM(chargebacks_returns) / SUM(gross_units_sold) FROM steam_sold as subquery WHERE subquery.date <= currquery.date and subquery.game = currquery.game) as "value"
FROM steam_sold as currquery
WHERE
  game = '$games'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  datelocal as time,
  amount
FROM steam_followers
WHERE game = '$games'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT 
  datelocal,
  (SELECT SUM(deletes) FROM steam_wishlists b WHERE b.datelocal <= steam_wishlists.datelocal AND b.game = steam_wishlists.game) as deleted,
  (SELECT SUM(adds) - SUM(deletes) - SUM(purchases_and_activations) FROM steam_wishlists b WHERE b.datelocal <= steam_wishlists.datelocal AND b.game = steam_wishlists.game) as active, 
  (SELECT SUM(purchases_and_activations) FROM steam_wishlists b WHERE b.datelocal <= steam_wishlists.datelocal AND b.game = steam_wishlists.game) as purchased
FROM steam_wishlists 
WHERE game = '$games' AND
  $__timeFilter(datelocal)

SELECT 
  datelocal,
  (100 * deleted / (deleted + active + purchased)) as deleted,
  (100 * active / (deleted + active + purchased)) as active,
  (100 * purchased / (deleted + active + purchased)) as purchased
FROM (
  SELECT 
    datelocal,
    (SELECT SUM(deletes) FROM steam_wishlists b WHERE b.datelocal <= steam_wishlists.datelocal AND b.game = steam_wishlists.game) as deleted,
    (SELECT SUM(adds) - SUM(deletes) - SUM(purchases_and_activations) FROM steam_wishlists b WHERE b.datelocal <= steam_wishlists.datelocal AND b.game = steam_wishlists.game) as active, 
    (SELECT SUM(purchases_and_activations) FROM steam_wishlists b WHERE b.datelocal <= steam_wishlists.datelocal AND b.game = steam_wishlists.game) as purchased
  FROM steam_wishlists 
  WHERE game = '$games' AND
    $__timeFilter(datelocal)
) a
WHERE (deleted + active + purchased) > 0

SELECT
  datelocal AS "time",
  (SELECT SUM(adds) - SUM(deletes) - SUM(purchases_and_activations) - SUM(gifts) FROM steam_wishlists as subquery WHERE subquery.datelocal <= currquery.datelocal and subquery.game = currquery.game) as "value",
  game as "metric"
FROM steam_wishlists as currquery
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(currquery.datelocal)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  datelocal AS "time",
  amount as "value",
  game as "metric"
FROM steam_followers as currquery
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(currquery.datelocal)
ORDER BY 1

matcher.options: Alchemistry ($ net sale before taxes & steam cut)
Extortion ($ net sale before taxes & steam cut)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  date AS "time",
  (SELECT SUM(net_units_sold) FROM steam_sold as subquery WHERE subquery.date <= currquery.date and subquery.game = currquery.game) as "value",
  CONCAT(game, ' (net units)') as "metric"
FROM steam_sold as currquery
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(currquery.date)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  date AS "time",
  (SELECT SUM(net_steam_sale_usd) FROM steam_sold as subquery WHERE subquery.date <= currquery.date and subquery.game = currquery.game) as "value",
  CONCAT(game, ' ($ net sale before taxes & steam cut)') as "metric"
FROM steam_sold as currquery
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(currquery.date)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  date AS "time",
  (SELECT SUM(gross_steam_sale_usd) FROM steam_sold as subquery WHERE subquery.date <= currquery.date and subquery.game = currquery.game) as "value",
  CONCAT(game, ' ($ gross)') as "metric"
FROM steam_sold as currquery
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(currquery.date)
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Copies sold | Net $ sold before taxes & steam cut
Stats from day 0 (public page or release date)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  (datelocal - (SELECT MIN(datelocal) FROM steam_wishlists WHERE game = currquery.game AND adds != 0)) AS "day",
  (SELECT SUM(adds) - SUM(deletes) - SUM(purchases_and_activations) FROM steam_wishlists as subquery WHERE subquery.datelocal <= currquery.datelocal and subquery.game = currquery.game) as "value",
  game as metric
FROM steam_wishlists as currquery
WHERE adds != 0 OR deletes != 0
ORDER BY 1 ASC, 3 ASC

SELECT
  (datelocal - (SELECT MIN(datelocal) FROM steam_followers WHERE game = currquery.game)) AS "day",
  amount as "value",
  game as metric
FROM steam_followers as currquery
ORDER BY 1 ASC, 3 ASC

SELECT DISTINCT
  (date - (SELECT MIN(date) FROM steam_sold WHERE game = currquery.game AND net_units_sold != 0)) AS "day",
  (SELECT SUM(net_units_sold) FROM steam_sold as subquery WHERE subquery.date <= currquery.date and subquery.game = currquery.game) as "value",
  game as metric
FROM steam_sold as currquery
WHERE net_units_sold != 0
ORDER BY 1 ASC, 3 ASC

SELECT
  date AS "time",
  (SELECT 100.0 * SUM(chargebacks_returns) / SUM(gross_units_sold) FROM steam_sold as subquery WHERE subquery.date <= currquery.date and subquery.game = currquery.game) as "value",
  CONCAT(game, ' (% return)') as "metric"
FROM steam_sold as currquery
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(currquery.date)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  a.date as "time",
  SUM(b.gross_steam_sale_usd) AS "Gross ($)",
  SUM(b.net_steam_sale_usd) AS "Net ($)"
FROM (SELECT distinct date FROM steam_sold) a
INNER JOIN steam_sold b ON b.date BETWEEN (a.date - interval '364 days') AND a.date
WHERE $__timeFilter(a.date) 
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT
  a.date as "time",
  SUM(b.gross_units_sold) AS "Gross Units",
  SUM(b.net_units_sold) AS "Net Units"
FROM (SELECT distinct date FROM steam_sold) a
INNER JOIN steam_sold b ON b.date BETWEEN (a.date - interval '364 days') AND a.date
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1 ASC
